A

AbstractLight - Class in lighting
This abstract class holds all the shared functionality for all lights.
AbstractLight() - Constructor for class lighting.AbstractLight
Constructs an abstract light (this will be called by all implementing lights).
AbstractSurface - Class in surfaces
This abstract class holds all the shared functionality for all surfaces.
AbstractSurface() - Constructor for class surfaces.AbstractSurface
 
add(IPoint3D) - Method in interface vectors.IPoint3D
Returns a point which adds the coordinate values of this point to the coordinate values of the given point (not changing the coordinate values of this point).
add(IPoint3D) - Method in class vectors.Point3D
Returns a point which adds the coordinate values of this point to the coordinate values of the given point (not changing the coordinate values of this point).
addColor(IColor) - Method in class colors.Color
Adds the color (values) to another color (values) and returns the result color (not changing the current color).
addColor(IColor) - Method in interface colors.IColor
Adds the color (values) to another color (values) and returns the result color (not changing the current color).
addObject(String) - Method in class application.Parser
Adds a new object to the scene.
addObject(String) - Method in class scene.SceneParser
Adds a new object to the scene.
addVector(IVector3D) - Method in interface vectors.IVector3D
Returns the result vector of adding this vector to the given vector (does not change this vector).
addVector(IVector3D) - Method in class vectors.Vector3D
Returns the result vector of adding this vector to the given vector (does not change this vector).

AnotatedTriangle - Class in sceneObjects
This mini-class represents a triangle, which also knows the indexes (at the vertex array) of his points.
AnotatedTriangle() - Constructor for class sceneObjects.AnotatedTriangle
 
application - package application
 
AreaLight - Class in lighting
This class represents an area light (like point light but it has a area which is not zero).
AreaLight() - Constructor for class lighting.AreaLight
